name: From The Depths Of Hell
description:
--The Team--

Christoforos Nicolaou - Developer -  j29pro@gmail.com

Nicolas Nohi - Developer - noxinikolas@gmail.com

Michael Moraris - Artist - morarismichalis@gmail.com 

--Source Code--

https://github.com/nnouhi/GameDev.tv-2022-Game-Jam-2022

--Game Story--

You are Hellias Psinakis and on the 12th of February 2018, you were sent to prison because you were framed by someone that had committed a big crime. On the 15th of March 2022, you were wrongfully sentenced to the electric chair where you left your last breath and got sent to hell. Today, the 30th of May 2022 is your lucky day because it seems like a guard forgot to lock your cell. Do you have what it takes to escape from the depths of hell and rise to the gates of paradise to claim your rightful place?

--Controls--

Movement: W,A,S,D - Arrow Keys

Jump: Space

Pause: Escape

--Mechanics--

Wall Jump: Is possible for a limited time

Long Jump Boost: Jump higher for a limited time

Double Jump Boost: Can double jump for a limited time

Slow motion Boost: Can slow down time for a limited time
